mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE (SCHEDULE_ID, TITLE, MEMO, START_DT, END_DT, IMPORTANT_YN, MEMBER_ID) VALUES (#{scheduleId}, #{title}, #{memo}, #{startDt}, #{endDt}, #{importantYn}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT sc.SCHEDULE_ID, sc.TITLE, sc.START_DT, sc.END_DT, sc.IMPORTANT_YN FROM SCHEDULE sc, SHARE sh WHERE sc.SCHEDULE_ID = sh.SCHEDULE_ID AND sc.START_DT <= #{endDt} AND sc.END_DT >= #{startDt} AND ( (sh.GROUP_YN = 'N' AND sh.SHARE_ID = #{memberId}) OR (sh.GROUP_YN = 'Y' AND sh.SHARE_ID IN ( SELECT GROUP_ID FROM GROUP_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}) ) ) ORDER BY START_DT
